description: Removes the specified certificate from the certificate list for the specified HTTPS or TLS listener.

parameters.name: ListenerArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the listener.

parameters.name: Certificates
parameters.description: The certificate to remove. You can specify one certificate per call. Set CertificateArn to the certificate ARN but do not set IsDefault. (dict) --- Information about an SSL server certificate. CertificateArn (string) --- The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate. IsDefault (boolean) --- Indicates whether the certificate is the default certificate. Do not set this value when specifying a certificate as an input. This value is not included in the output when describing a listener, but is included when describing listener certificates.

nested_params.name: CertificateArn
nested_params.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the certificate.

nested_params.name: IsDefault
nested_params.description: Indicates whether the certificate is the default certificate. Do not set this value when specifying a certificate as an input. This value is not included in the output when describing a listener, but is included when describing listener certificates.
